utility.name: Kali Linux Metapackage: kali-linux-top10
utility.author: Z. Cliffe Schreuders
utility.description: Installs a collection of software onto Kali. kali-tools-top10 (and some other common attack tools) In Kali Linux, we have a sub-menu called “Top 10 Security Tools”. The kali-linux-top10 metapackage will install all of these tools for you in one fell swoop. Installation Size: 3.5 GB
